description:
"Am I a mooch?!" After watching an interview on TV, Wakasa realizes he may be a mooch. Wakasa asks Tatsumi to help him find work. He tries to write a resume, but with nothing to list but "20 years of experience as a merman," he abandons the idea. Tatsumi suggests entering prize contests. Wakasa enthusiastically begins writing, but...
Can Wakasa clear his doubts about being a mooch?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La situation du travail de Wakasa
